scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELEVENTY_ENV=development TAILWIND_MODE=watch npx eleventy --serve
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  ELEVENTY_ENV=production  TAILWIND_MODE=build npx eleventy
scripts.debug: npx rimraf '_site/!(img)'; cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELEVENTY_ENV=production DEBUG=* npx eleventy
